# admiralty-tab

## Properties

| Property       | Attribute        | Description                                                                     | Type      | Default |
| -------------- | ---------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `active`       | `active`         | Set internally by parent tab group component to indicate tab content is active. | `boolean` | `false` |
| `index`        | `index`          | Tab index.  To be set internally by parent tab group component.                 | `number`  | `-1`    |
| `label`        | `label`          | Tab label                                                                       | `string`  | `''`    |
| `tabContentId` | `tab-content-id` | Tab content Id.  To be set internally by parent tab group component.            | `string`  | `""`    |
| `tabLabelId`   | `tab-label-id`   | Tab label Id.  To be set internally by parent tab group component.              | `string`  | `""`    |
